Athar El-Hakim (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1957) bụ onye Ijipt na-eme ihe nkiri.
El-Hakim gara Mahadum Ain Shams wee nweta akara ugo mmụta na Bekee
O mechara rụọ ọrụ na mmekọrịta ọha na eze na họtel. El-Hakim mekwara ihe ngosi ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye mgbasa ozi redio
Onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri bụ Riad El-Erian hụrụ ya, onye mere ka o kwenye ịmalite ọrụ ime ihe nkiri. El-Hakim mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na 1979, na The Killer Who Killed No One nke Ahmed Yassin duziri
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ pụtara na ihe ngosi nke TV a kpọrọ Abnaie Al Aezzaa Shokran

El-Hakim natara onyinye site na Arab International Radio and Television Association maka òkè ya na ihe ngosi ahụ, ma nweta onyinye Papyrus maka ime ihe nkiri n'oge asọmpi nke Ministry of Culture. N'afọ 1981, ọ pụtara dị ka nwa akwụkwọ kọleji dị elu na I'm Not Lying But I'm Beautifying na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Salah Zulfikar na Ahmed Zaki, nke ghọrọ ọrụ ya a kacha mara ya.
Ọ malitere ịga nzukọ ọmụmụ ihe okpukpe n'afọ ndị 1990

N'afọ 2001, El-Hakim pụtara na usoro ihe nkiri TV Escaping from Love dị ka Siham, nwanyị na-enweta Ph.D mana ọ nọpụrụ iche na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya. N'afọ 2002, El-Hakim jụrụ ịrụ ọrụ ọ bụla mgbe ụmụ ya nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
Mgbe afọ agụmakwụkwọ gwụsịrị, ọ kpọọrọ ha gaa ezumike na Siria na Lebanọn
N'afọ 2003, El-Hakim maliteghachiri ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya site n'ịkpọ Jaclyn Khouri na usoro TV Kharaz Mulawan
Ọ bụ Ahmed Khader duziri ya na mba Lebanọn ma bụrụ maka esemokwu Arab-Israel mgbe mkpebi UN nke 1947 kewara na steeti abụọ.
N'afọ 2012, El-Hakim kpọrọ oku ka a kagbuo Kansụl Shura nke Ijipt

Ọ kpọrọ ya ihe na-adịghị uru ọ bara ma kwuo na ọ na-efu ọtụtụ nde pound. El-Hakim lara ezumike nká na ndụ nka na 2013, mgbe ọ natara otuto n'oge mbipụta nke asaa nke Salé International Women's Film Festival.
